con:testCase.name: RR04-RegRportingAmountlimitExceed
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for RR04-RegRportingAmountlimitExceed

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM = 1

con:property.con:name: expectedStatusReason
con:property.con:value: Regulatory reporting amount limit reached and no regulatory reporting codes provided

con:property.con:name: actualStatusReason
con:property.con:value: Regulatory reporting amount limit reached and no regulatory reporting codes provided

con:config.con:query: select m.MESSAGEID , p.paymentinfoid,t.transactionsid , t.ENDTOENDID , t.PAYMENTTYPE, t.PAYMENTSTATUS, t.ISPC , t.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID from message m , paymentinfo p , transactions t where m.messageid = p.fk_messageid and p.paymentinfoid = t.fk_paymentinfoid and t.ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%' and PAYMENTSTATUS = 'REJC'

select * from statusreason S, STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF SI where S.STATUSREASONID = SI.FK_STATUSREASONID and (S.FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' OR S.FK_Paymentinfoid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTINFOID[1]}' or s.FK_messageid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MESSAGEID[1]}') order by CODE desc

con:assertion.name: Regulatory reporting amount limit reached and no regulatory reporting codes provided

con:configuration.token: <ADDITIONALINFORMATION>Regulatory reporting amount limit reached and no regulatory reporting codes provided</ADDITIONALINFORMATION>
